text: ==Regular season== The 1948 season was the Phillies' 16th consecutive losing season. It was the major league record until the Pittsburgh Pirates broke it in 2009 with their 17th consecutive losing season. ===Season standings=== === Record vs. opponents === ===Notable transactions=== * April 7, 1948: Ralph LaPointe and $30,000 were traded by the Phillies to the St. Louis Cardinals for Dick Sisler. ===Roster=== {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
